article:
'Nat' is a slang term from the [[Wild Cards]] novels referring to normal humans
uninfected by the Wild Card virus. Most often used by Jokers when referring to
their uninfected oppressors, though also occasionally employed by Aces as a
pejorative. Fleur van Rensselaer (daughter of the ace Brain Trust) once observed
that, though the term is short for "natural," it has another secondary meaning
as a homonym - "gnats," which reveals how some wild carders feel about non
powered humans. Nat is one of the few words in the parlance of Wild Cards that
does not have its origin in card game terminology. It is unknown who first
coined the word.
